mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT b.*, r.re_cnt FROM review b LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT re_num, COUNT(*) re_cnt FROM review_reply GROUP BY re_num)r ON b.re_num = r.re_num ORDER BY b.re_num DESC)a) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT b.*, r.re_id FROM member_detail b LEFT JOIN (SELECT re_id FROM review)r ON b.m_id = r.re_id)a);

SELECT b.*, c.m_id, c.m_auth FROM (SELECT rere_num, rere_content, TO_CHAR(rere_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') rere_regdate, re_num, re_id, rere_depth, rere_parentnum FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM review_reply START WITH rere_depth = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR rere_num = rere_parentnum ORDER SIBLINGS BY rere_num DESC)a))b LEFT JOIN member c ON b.re_id=c.m_id
